duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide outstanding customer service and support the store in meeting customer service goals.
Offer assistance to customers proactively and without prompt, using suggestive selling techniques.
Use technology such as mobile devices, digital point-of-sale, Belk App, and website to enhance the customer shopping experience.
Meet or exceed personal sales goals, increase units sold per transaction, and reduce shrinkage in the area.
Maintain store standards, assist with non-sell duties, and comply with store policies.
Assist Operations teams with non-sell duties as assigned by Sales Team Manager.

education_certification.credential: No education requirement. Experience in retail preferred.
